articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Antony Blinken arrives in Kyiv to reassure Ukraine, as Russia ramps up offensive - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: U.S. secretary of state’s visit comes as Russia’s assault on the Kharkiv region intensifies.
articles.content: Blinken will use his trip to send a strong signal of reassurance to Kyiv about enduring U.S. support and to highlight how American aid will help the Ukrainians take back the initiative on the battlef… [+1188 chars]
